TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueryTranslationPreprocessor extends System.Object

summary.para: A class that preprocesses the query before translation.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Implementation of database providers and extensions and How EF Core queries work for more information.

summary.para: Normalizes queryable methods in the query.

This method extracts query metadata information like tracking, ignore query filters. It also converts potential enumerable methods on navigation to queryable methods. It flattens patterns of GroupJoin-SelectMany patterns to appropriate Join/LeftJoin.

Docs.returns: A query expression after normalization has been done.
